title: Lovely, quiet, private, and comfortable. Rent this 2 bd, 1 ba today!
posting_body: ['The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '483 Scott Blvd', 'Castle Rock, CO 80104', 'show contact info', 'Inside your apartment, you will enjoy high-quality features like gas fireplaces, 9-foot ceilings, walk-in closets, an attached balcony/patio, and plenty of storage space.', 'Many of our apartments even include an in-home washer and dryer!', 'Also, our community is pet-friendly with a limit of 2 pets per apartment.', 'Visit our amenities page to see what you can look forward to when you make the move to The Bluffs at Castle Rock.', 'Bedrooms: 2 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 925 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $2170/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '➢ BBQ and Picnic Area', '➢ Coffee Bar', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Lounge', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Playground', '➢ Resident Business Center', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ 5 minutes from Target, Home Depot and The Castle Rock Factory Outlets', '➢ Bark Park and Dog Run Area', '➢ Easy Access to I-25', '➢ Game Room with Shuffleboard', '➢ Next to Castle Rock Community Center', '➢ On-Site Management and Maintenance', '➢ Outdoor Lounge with Fire Pit', '➢ Self-Guided Tours', '➢ Short-term Lease Available', '➢ Sparkling Pool/Spa', 'This Unit Comes With:', '➢ Air Conditioning/Heating', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Kitchen', '➢ Linen Closet', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Accent Color Walls', '➢ Double Pane Windows', '➢ Gas Fireplaces on Top Floors', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Newly Renovated', '➢ Patio/Balcony', '➢ Private Entrances', '➢ Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In Select Homes', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings on Top Floors', '➢ Vinyl Flooring', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$30/pet, pet rent per month.', '$300 non-refundable pet fee; $300 pet deposit per pet will be collected.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DAFD664D313B447']
